beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE VADTCRE USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePath}VADTCRE.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_ENT REFERENCED_COD_ENT from VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_ENT_FINAN_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT = ref.COD_ENT and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS = ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.NUM_VER_PROC = ref.NUM_VER_PROC)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_PER REFERENCED_COD_PER from VADTCRE_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp0 base left outer join HE1_MX_MAE_PERSONAS_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_PER=ref.COD_PER and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CVE_REG from VADTCRE_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp1 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.COD_TIPO_BAJA=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS)  where FCH_BAJA <> '0001-01-01' and COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and COD_TAB_GEN='0619'

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_COD_GRALS_VAL_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_COD_GRALS_VAL_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CLAVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CLAVE_REG from VADTCRE_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp2 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_COD_GRALS_VAL_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.COD_MODELO=ref. COD_CLAVE_REG and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_CAT=’MVA’

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_COD_GRALS_VAL_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_COD_GRALS_VAL_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_CLAVE_REG REFERENCED_COD_CLAVE_REG from VADTCRE_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp3 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_COD_GRALS_VAL_DRO ref on (base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base. COD_MOTIV_AJUST_MOD=ref. COD_CLAVE_REG and base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS) where ref.COD_CAT=’MAJ’

beforeAll.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO USING com.databricks.spark.csv OPTIONS (path "${basePathDomain}HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO.csv", header "true", inferSchema "false")

source.sql: Select base.*, ref.COD_NIVEL REFERENCED_COD_NIVEL from VADTCRE_standardized_validated_and_domain_temp4 base left outer join HE1_MX_CAT_TAB_CORP_ALTAIR_DRO ref on (base.FCH_CORTE_DATOS=ref.FCH_CORTE_DATOS and base.COD_NIVEL=ref.COD_CVE_REG and base.COD_ENT=ref.COD_ENT and base.NUM_VER_PROC=ref.NUM_VER_PROC ) where ref.COD_SIGLA_IDIOMA='E' and ref.COD_TAB_GEN='0717'

afterAll.sql: select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated union all select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated_and_domain0 union all select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated_and_domain1 union all select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated_and_domain2 union all select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated_and_domain3 union all select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated_and_domain4 union all select * from errors_VADTCRE_standardized_and_validated_and_domain5
